message:
Recalled the personality of Kedarnath Sahni Ji & released a compilation of his thoughts & anecdotes from his life. Kedarnath Ji...dedicated to the organisation, always put wellbeing of nation over everything, a man of letters & a very hardworking leader.

It is because of leaders like Kedarnath Ji that the Jan Sangh & the BJP were built and have been able to serve people for years. 
http://nm-4.com/xjmy
